story.title: Fake Boyfriend for Christmas - Episode 1
story.storyDescription: Zoe: Hello, I’m looking for Aiden?
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Lauren Hawkeye is a NYT and USA Today bestselling author of contemporary and erotic romance.

messages.text: Hello, I’m looking for Aiden?
You realize you’re texting, not calling, right?
Yeah, sorry. Am I not supposed to text in this situation?
I mean, maybe? We are about to be fake dating in a few days.
Yeah but…we’ve never met before. This is all really new to me.
It’s all good, I was just teasing you.
So, you’re Zack’s sister?
Indeed.
I’m sorry you’re related to him.
Hey! That’s my brother you’re talking about.
Again, just joking.
Zack is cool. We’re been friends since freshman year. He’s a good guy.
He’s also a good brother for asking you to do this for me.
I feel so lame, asking for a pretend boyfriend at our family Christmas dinner.
Um…this is in front of your family?
OMG. Zack was supposed to tell you that!
Well…he did 😏
Sorry. I really like to joke around. Did he not warn you?
Of course I’m stuck with the guy who’s always joking.
Well, beggars can’t be choosers…
Hey!
Sorry. Couldn’t resist teasing you back 😉
Ah. A worthy opponent. That’s all I wanted for Christmas.
Oh, good. So does that mean your helping me out with my Christmas wish?
Well, I was down to fake date you before…
But now that we’ve talked…
Yes. Can we make Christmas tomorrow?
LOL may I ask why you’re agreeing to this?
Not that I don’t hugely appreciate it, and everything! 🙂
Haha, sure. The way I see it…I get a holiday meal.
Left to my own devices, I would be eating mac n cheese…again.
This is a pretty serious win in my books.
Fair enough.
I also get to the spend Christmas with Zack.
Also true.
And his hot sister.
What? You don’t know that I’m hot!
I do, actually.
I went full Facebook stalker after Zack asked me about this.
Did you now?
Are you trying to tell me that you didn’t look me up too?
I refuse to answer that on the grounds that it may incriminate me.
I love it when you talk nerdy to me 🤓
LOL I have to say, before I texted you, I thought could be a disaster.
But you actually seem pretty cool.
If you thought this could be a disaster, why are YOU doing it?
Okay, hear me out. This is going to sound stupid.
I doubt that.
So…Zack and I have one more sibling, an older sister.
Is her name Zelda?
What’s that supposed to mean?
You know, because Zoe and Zach both start with Z.
LOL no. The alliteration does not apply to my sister.
You just said alliteration in a text…
Marry me 💍
Our older sister’s name is Jessica.
And she’s…horrible.
Come on. You and Zack are pretty cool. If Jessica’s your sister…
Could she really be that bad?
Oh, she is.
She’s also newly engaged.
And she’s bringing her rich, perfect fiancé home for Christmas.
Ah, so you want to one up her by bringing home the best-looking guy on campus.
Our whole lives, she’s always been the perfect one.
The smart one. The pretty one. The popular one.
And she always likes to rub it in my face.
How does Zack feel about all of this?
He’s a guy, so the competition isn’t there, but…
He’s not a fan of her, either. This was his idea, actually.
Smart brother.
He has his moments.
Truth. Well, I’m in, so…what are the details?
Are you sure?
Don’t you have other plans? It’s Christmas.
Nope.
My parents are divorced and live on opposite sides of the country.
Neither of which are near here.
If I choose to visit one of them for the holidays, the other gets upset so…
This year my choice is neither.
Ugh, I’m sorry. That sounds awful.
Don’t be. I get a hot fake girlfriend for Christmas.
I thought I was a worthy opponent?
Ah, I’m a lucky guy. I get both for the price of one. Wit and beauty.
How many eye roll emojis can I send in one conversation?
Don’t worry, I’ll get you into the Guinness Book of World Records yet.
Must. Not. Use. Emoji.
But for real. We leave on Friday.
Good. Then we have time.
What? Time for what?
A date. Maybe three of them.
You know you’re supposed to be my FAKE boyfriend, right?
I’ve been informed of that, but…
If your sister Jessica is so smart, she might figure us out.
So it’s probably a good idea to hang out a bit beforehand.
Get comfortable with each other.
That’s not a bad idea.
I’m glad you think so.
Because I’m outside your door.
WHAT?
HOW DID YOU GET MY ADDRESS?
Uh…I’m friends with your brother, remember?
Oh, right.
I suppose that makes this significantly less creepy.
Are you going to let me in?
Suddenly feeling nervous, Zoe tucks her phone into her pocket.
Butterflies fly in her stomach as she hurries to the door and opens it.
There, she sees her brother’s friend, holding a very full backpack.
He was right that she looked him up on Facebook before texting him…
And he’s even hotter in person.
Hot enough that she wishes this could be a real date.
Do I pass inspection?
Zoe blushes. She realizes that she’s been staring.
Sorry, sorry. Come on in.
I brought food. Zack said you like Chinese.
I do.
Egg drop soup and ginger beef, right?
Uh…yes. Those are my favorites.
Aiden unpacks the food onto the coffee table.
And your favorite drink is diet cola?
I can’t decide if this is romantic or creepy…
You definitely think it’s romantic, right?
Zoe blushes again, but it’s paired with a bubbling laugh.
I mean…I guess it’s fake romantic. Because you’re my fake boyfriend.
Aiden pulls something else from his backpack.
It’s green, and it’s attached to a sparkly red ribbon.
What’s that?
This is mistletoe.
Zoe’s eyes widen, and excitement rushes through her veins.
Fake mistletoe for a fake boyfriend?
It’s real mistletoe.
And that means?
That I have a confession to make.
Uh-oh.
I’m going to ignore that for a second, okay?
Because I’ve known about you and your older sister for a long time.
Since I first started hanging out with Zack.
So when he said that you were nervous about going home for Christmas…
Because of how your sister would act this year…
I might have…er, suggested…
Yes?
That it would be great if I posed as your fake boyfriend for Christmas.
What? YOU suggested this?
Why?
Because if I was your fake boyfriend…
Then I’d have a few days to get to know you.
You know, Zack’s hot sister.
Who I’ve had a crush on from afar.
Ever since he first mentioned you.
Zoe knows that she’s staring, but she can’t seem to make herself speak.
The idea that someone would go to this much trouble to be with HER—
And not her sister Jessica—
Is hard to believe.
Yet here is Aiden, holding a sprig of very real mistletoe over their heads.
So…you’re saying that, instead of going home for Christmas with a fake boyfriend…
I want you to go home with a real one.
That’s me, by the way.
If you’ll have me.
Aiden wiggles the sprig of mistletoe over their heads.
Zoe feels warm all over.
Truth is, she hasn’t been able to get Aiden out of her mind.
Not since she looked him up on Facebook.
She’s had a crush on him from afar, too.
And she’s really excited at the prospect of spending Christmas with him.
She looks up at the sprig of mistletoe.
So, if I’m following your somewhat crazy line of thought here…
If I give you a real kiss under real mistletoe…
You’ll magically transform into my real boyfriend?
Aiden grins.
See? You’re totally a worthy opponent.
Zoe takes a hesitant step toward him.
And Aiden closes the rest of the distance between them.
Still holding the mistletoe over their heads…
He dips his head to kiss her.
And as they kiss, he drops the mistletoe.
His hands get lost in her hair as she strokes his face.
And then, when they finally pull apart, they’re both out of breath.
So what do you think? Can I be your real boyfriend?
Zoe grins. She can’t believe this is happening.
You certainly can.
It’s all I wanted for Christmas.
